tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE opinions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    opinion_text TEXT,
    likes INT,
    date_posted DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (influencer_id) REFERENCES influencers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  influencer_id INT,
  post_date DATE,
  post_content TEXT,
  likes_count INT,
  shares_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  commenter_name VARCHAR(255),
  comment_date DATETIME,
  comment_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Influencers (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  followers INT,
  avg_likes INT,
  last_post_date DATE,
  political_leaning VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE Posts (post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  influencer_id UUID,
  post_date TIMESTAMP,
  post_content TEXT,
  likes INT,
  comments INT,
  shares INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (influencer_id) REFERENCES Influencers(id));

CREATE TABLE Comments (comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id UUID,
  commenter_name VARCHAR(255),
  comment_text TEXT,
  comment_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id));

CREATE TABLE Followers (follower_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  influencer_id UUID,
  follower_name VARCHAR(255),
  follow_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (influencer_id) REFERENCES Influencers(id));

CREATE TABLE Opinions (opinion_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  follower_id UUID,
  influencer_id UUID,
  political_opinion TEXT,
  opinion_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (follower_id) REFERENCES Followers(follower_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (influencer_id) REFERENCES Influencers(id));
